data.descrizione: After a Black Friday riot ends in tragedy, a mysterious Thanksgiving-inspired killer terrorizes Plymouth, Massachusetts - the birthplace of the infamous holiday.
data.attori: Patrick Dempsey, Ty Olsson, Gina Gershon

data.descrizione: A woman swimming in her pool at night is terrorized by an evil spirit
data.attori: Wyatt Russell, Kerry Condon, Amélie Hoeferle

data.descrizione: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.
data.attori: Mia Goth, Jenna Ortega, Brittany Snow

data.descrizione: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.
data.attori: Ari McCarthy, Hamish Phillips, Kit Erhart-Bruce

data.descrizione: 1956 - France. A priest is murdered. An evil is spreading. The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.
data.attori: Taissa Farmiga, Jonas Bloquet, Storm Reid

data.descrizione: A malevolent being known as The Jester terrorizes the inhabitants of a small town on Halloween night, including two estranged sisters who must come together to find a way to defeat this evil entity.
data.attori: Michael Sheffield, Lelia Symington, Delaney White

data.descrizione: When two girls disappear into the woods and return three days later with no memory of what happened to them, the father of one girl seeks out Chris MacNeil, who's been forever altered by what happened to her daughter fifty years ago.
data.attori: Lafortune Joseph, Leslie Odom Jr., Gastner Legerme

data.descrizione: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.
data.attori: Keanu Reeves, Laurence, FishburneGeorge, Georgiou

data.descrizione: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
data.attori: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

data.descrizione: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor 'Sully' Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago by the House of Moncada.
data.attori: Tom Holland, Mark Wahlberg, Antonio Banderas

data.descrizione: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
data.attori: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Jeffrey Wright

data.titolo: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
data.descrizione: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.
data.attori: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames

data.descrizione: Aquaman balances his duties as king and as a member of the Justice League, all while planning a wedding. Black Manta is on the hunt for Atlantean tech to help rebuild his armor. Orm plots to escape his Atlantean prison.
data.attori: Jason MomoaBen AffleckPatrick Wilson

data.descrizione: Carol Danvers gets her powers entangled with those of Kamala Khan and Monica Rambeau, forcing them to work together to save the universe.
data.attori: Brie Larson, Teyonah Parris, Iman Vellani

data.descrizione: A high schooler gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.
data.attori: Chinatsu Akasaki, Aya Endô, Kana Hanazawa

data.descrizione: The Red Ribbon Army from Goku's past has returned with two new androids to challenge him and his friends.
data.attori: Masako Nozawa, Aya Hisakawa, Ryô Horikawa

data.descrizione: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.
data.attori: Masako Nozawa, Aya Hisakawa, Ryô Horikawa

data.titolo: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
data.descrizione: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.
data.attori: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Harvey Guillén

data.descrizione: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.
data.regista: Aaron Horvath, Michael Jelenic, Pierre Leduc
data.attori: Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day

data.descrizione: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.
data.attori: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff

data.descrizione: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.
data.regista: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
data.attori: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry
